attributes.action: Stop welfare benefits too many people are taking advantage and working cash
attributes.additional_details: As the people receiving welfare benefits are more healthier than working people and its unfair that tax payers have to pay for other people’s rent and also those people are working cash in hand aswell
attributes.background:
As there is a hundreds thousands of people receiving welfare benefits and working cash in hand getting tax payers money everymonth 
Would like the government to make stricter rules like only British citizens can receive benefits as it’s unfair

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you are concerned about benefits, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

It is unclear whether you want the Government to stop all benefits entirely, or something else.
